trans-unit.source: A persistence provider throws this exception when it is unable to acquire a lock on an instance because the instance is already locked by another owner.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于某个实例已被另一个所有者锁定，因此当永久性提供程序无法获取对该实例的锁定就会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 异常的原因。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> class by using the error message passed as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用作为参数传递的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The information about the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 有关当前异常的信息。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 异常的原因。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 引发当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> class by using the error message and the inner exception information passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用作为参数传递的错误消息和内部异常信息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a result of a previous exception typically includes a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常引发的异常通常包含对 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ExceptionDetail.InnerException%2A> 属性中的前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 此命令的 XName（命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行此命令所针对的目标实例的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command and the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用作为参数传递的此命令的 XName（命名空间和名称的组合）和执行此命令所针对的目标实例的 ID 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 此命令的 XName（命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行此命令所针对的目标实例的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 引发当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, and the inner exception information passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用作为参数传递的此命令的 XName（命名空间和名称的组合）、执行此命令所针对的目标实例的 ID 和内部异常信息来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 此命令的 XName（命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行此命令所针对的目标实例的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the owner that currently has a lock on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前具有对此实例的锁定的所有者的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Serializable metadata information about the instance owner (who has a lock on the instance).
trans-unit.target: 有关实例所有者（具有对此实例的锁定）的可序列化的元数据信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, the ID of the owner that currently has a lock on the instance, and serializable metadata information of the owner passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用作为参数传递的此命令的 XName（命名空间和名称的组合）、执行此命令所针对的目标实例的 ID、当前具有对此实例的锁定的所有者的 ID 和该所有者的可序列化的元数据信息来初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 此命令的 XName（命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行此命令所针对的目标实例的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 引发当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, the error message that explains the reason for the exception, and the exception that caused the current exception passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用作为参数传递的此命令的 XName（命名空间和名称的组合）、执行此命令所针对的目标实例的 ID、解释此异常的原因的错误消息和引发当前异常的异常初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 此命令的 XName（命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行此命令所针对的目标实例的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the owner that currently has a lock on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前具有对此实例的锁定的所有者的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Serializable metadata information about the instance owner (who has a lock on the instance).
trans-unit.target: 有关实例所有者（具有对此实例的锁定）的可序列化的元数据信息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 引发当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, the ID of the owner that currently has a lock on the instance, serializable metadata information about the owner, and the exception that caused the current exception passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用作为参数传递的此命令的 XName（命名空间和名称的组合）、执行此命令所针对的目标实例的 ID、当前具有对此实例的锁定的所有者的 ID、有关此所有者的可序列化的元数据信息和引发当前异常的异常初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command.
trans-unit.target: 此命令的 XName（命名空间和名称的组合）。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the target instance against which the command was executed.
trans-unit.target: 执行此命令所针对的目标实例的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the owner that currently has lock on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前具有对此实例的锁定的所有者的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The serializable metadata information about the instance owner (who has a lock on the instance).
trans-unit.target: 有关实例所有者（具有对此实例的锁定）的可序列化的元数据信息。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 引发当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> class using the XName (the combination of namespace and name) of the command, the ID of the target instance against which the command was executed, the ID of the owner that currently has a lock on the instance, serializable metadata information about the owner, the error message that explains the reason for the exception, and the exception that caused the current exception passed as parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用作为参数传递的此命令的 XName（命名空间和名称的组合）、执行此命令所针对的目标实例的 ID、当前具有对此实例的锁定的所有者的 ID、有关此所有者的可序列化的元数据信息、解释此异常的原因的错误消息和引发当前异常的异常初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceLockedException" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 有关引发的异常的序列化对象数据。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，其中包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用有关异常的信息设置 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID associated with the current instance owner (who currently has a lock on the instance).
trans-unit.target: 获取与当前实例所有者（具有对此实例的锁定）关联的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID associated with the current instance owner.
trans-unit.target: 与当前实例所有者关联的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Returns Guid.Empty if the current instance owner is not known.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前实例所有者未知，则返回 Guid.Empty。

trans-unit.source: Gets serializable metadata information about the current instance owner (who currently has a lock on the instance).
trans-unit.target: 获取有关当前实例所有者（当前具有对此实例的锁定）的可序列化的元数据信息。

trans-unit.source: When present, this consists of the subset of instance owner metadata which is serializable.
trans-unit.target: 如果获得这些信息，这些信息由可序列化的实例所有者元数据的子集组成。

trans-unit.source: The metadata may contain information such as the location of the instance owner, who currently owns the lock.
trans-unit.target: 元数据可以包含信息，如当前拥有锁定的实例所有者的位置。

trans-unit.source: The serializable metadata information about the current instance owner (who currently has a lock on the instance).
trans-unit.target: 有关当前实例所有者（当前具有对此实例的锁定）的可序列化的元数据信息。
